Issues.Title: [release/3.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/core-setup
Issues.Body:
This pull request updates the following dependencies

## From https://github.com/dotnet/core-setup
- **Build**: 20190410.12
- **Date Produced**: 4/11/2019 3:48 AM
- **Commit**: d5a76cb8c017737cd39f5df0e61522e7dae0a739
- **Branch**: refs/heads/release/3.0
- **Updates**:
  - **Microsoft.NETCore.App** -> 3.0.0-preview4-27610-12

## Coherency Updates

The following updates ensure that dependencies with a *CoherentParentDependency*
attribute were produced in a build used as input to the parent dependency's build.
See [Dependency Description Format](https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/blob/master/Documentation/DependencyDescriptionFormat.md#dependency-description-overview)

- **Microsoft.Win32.Registry** -> 4.6.0-preview4.19210.9 (parent: Microsoft.NETCore.App)

Issues.Title: build.cmd -pack doesn't update assemblies in artifacts\packaging
Issues.Body: When building locally and trying to produce packages, the assemblies aren't updated when passing in the `-pack` param. The developer has to first remove the artifacts\packaging directory and then build with `-pack`
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "build.cmd -pack doesn't update assemblies in artifacts\packaging" (#564)

Issues.Title: Some changes to Versions.props and Versions.Details.xml to make them easier to work in
Issues.Body:
* separate out version.props into different property groups by source to ease merging
* alphabetize version.props inside each property group
* alphabetize versions.details.xml by dependency name
* remove source ids
* make all xunit dependencies the same number

@vatsan-madhavan
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "Some changes to Versions.props and Versions.Details.xml to make them easier to work in " (#562)

Issues.Title: Onboard on async publishing #1126
Issues.Body:
Relates to: https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/issues/2443

Goal: mitigate `lock on the feed problem` and add further validations. [More details here.](https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/blob/master/Documentation/CorePackages/AsyncPublishing_HowToUse.md)

Test build was here: https://dnceng.visualstudio.com/internal/_build/results?buildId=149683
Test release: https://dnceng.visualstudio.com/internal/_releaseProgress?_a=release-pipeline-progress&releaseId=4444

Issues.Title: WindowsDesktop SDK should recognize Application.xaml
Issues.Body:
* .NET Core Version: 3.0.100-preview4-011006
* Windows version: 17763.437
* Does the bug reproduce also in WPF for .NET Framework 4.8?: N/A, this is a tooling issue

 **Problem description:**

The Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WindowsDesktop SDK only recognizes `App.xaml` for an automatic ApplicationDefinition item. The Visual Basic project templates call this file `Application.xaml`. Unless the file is renamed or an ApplicationDefinition item is manually specified, the project won't compile.
 
 **Actual behavior:**

Only App.xaml is recognized.
 
 **Expected behavior:**

The SDK should recognize both App.xaml and Application.xaml.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "WindowsDesktop SDK should recognize Application.xaml" (#550)

Issues.Title: Recognize Application.xaml as well as App.xaml
Issues.Body: VB projects, by convention, use Application.xaml for the name of their ApplicationDefinition file. Without this change, we run into the problem described at https://github.com/dotnet/wpf/issues/500. Fixes #550.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open PR "Recognize Application.xaml as well as App.xaml" (#545)

Issues.Title: LOC CHECKIN | Add PresentationBuildTasks xlf localization
Issues.Body:
* Add initial xlf files for PresentationBuildTasks

* Bring PresentationBuildTasks translations over from NETFX

* Modify PresentationBuildTasks csproj to enable satellite assembly generation

* Don't exclude PresentationBuildTasks from xlf localization in ShippingProjects.props
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open PR "LOC CHECKIN | Add PresentationBuildTasks xlf localization" (#544)

Issues.Title: Fix inconsistent line endings in license headers
Issues.Body: Fix inconsistent line endings in license headers. (Related to issue #533)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "Fix inconsistent line endings in license headers" (#542)

Issues.Title: Add helper script and update developer guide
Issues.Body:
This PR adds a helper script that I've been using locally that helps me test my local changes. It also updates the developer-guide.md on how to use the script effectively, as well as some other helpful information about testing locally built assemblies. I'm not sure how to test PBT yet, and hopefully @ryalanms can share more information on how that can be done.

Note: This script will currently only copy System.Xaml, but as soon as we start bringing more assemblies it will just work
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open PR "Add helper script and update developer guide" (#543)
